speaker: TECH 1
line: North Perimeter clear. No sign of him.

speaker: TECH 2
line: South access clear.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Camera one, pan right. Mulder, make for the west entrance.

speaker: TECH 3
line: West gate … No sign of suspect.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Two, angle south entrance.

speaker: TECH 4
line: Mid-park clear

speaker: SCULLY
line: There. The bus.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Three, zoom in.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Stay close, Mulder. We have Alpha off an east bound Metro bus.

speaker: TECH 2
line: I have alpha heading south.

speaker: SKINNER
line: One, follow suspect.

speaker: UNDERCOVER AGENT READING PAPER
line: Contact made.

speaker: SKINNER
line: All right, hold your positions.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What’s he looking at?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Two. Pick it up.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, he’s watching you.

speaker: TECH 2
line: He’s reaching for something.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Zoom in. One, zoom.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Okay, slowly. Slowly. Wait for it. Wait., wait. Wait for it.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Okay …

speaker: HALEY
line: What - what- what -? Hey.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What just happened? What’s happening?

speaker: SKINNER
line: I don’t know what the hell happened.

speaker: HALEY
line: Anybody! A doctor! I need a doctor over here.. My friend’s sick here. I don’t know what’s wrong. Oh, God. He just … he just fell … Ah, man.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What the hell’s going on?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I can’t see anything! There’s …

speaker: TECH 2
line: Beta target down!

speaker: TECH 3
line: We’ve lost Alpha!

speaker: SKINNER
line: Go! Go! Go!

speaker: SCULLY
line: There he is! He’s heading west. He’s on the move! He’s on the move!

speaker: MULDER
line: I’m on him!

speaker: SKINNER
line: Maintain your position on the downed Beta. Find the Alpha on three.

speaker: AGENT READING PAPER
line: Federal agents! Step aside! Oh, my God.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What is it?

speaker: AGENT READING PAPER
line: What that hell did he do to him?

speaker: SCULLY
line: What? What! What? What are you seeing?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Come on, talk to me! Talk to me!

speaker: AGENT READING PAPER
line: It’s eating away his flesh.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Haley must be carrying something lethal.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where’s Mulder?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Mulder was on him. There’s no way he couldn’t catch him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, respond!

speaker: SKINNER
line: Can you find him? Zoom in. Zoom in!

speaker: SCULLY
line: I can’t see a thing. Mulder, suspect is armed and dangerous. Pursue Alpha with extreme caution.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder! Damn it!

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Scully!

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What happened?

speaker: MULDER
line: I lost him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What do you mean?

speaker: MULDER
line: He got away.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I came in early. I wanted to take a look at the surveillance tape to make sure I wasn’t crazy. What happened out there, Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: "What happened?"

speaker: SCULLY
line: There were 12 agents yesterday in the park. We had ownership of the suspect. We were in position to make the capture and you let him get away. And from what I see now, you may have aided in his escape.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don’t know what you’re talking about.

speaker: SCULLY
line: It’s on the video, Mulder. I can’t prove it was you, but I know what I saw. This man is a murderer. He is a terrorist. I have a report to give this morning. I expect you to give me an answer. I expect you to tell me the truth.

speaker: MULDER
line: We’re late for the hearing.

speaker: SKINNER
line: 15 hours ago, a joint FBI/CIA task force assembled to capture Jacob Steven Haley, second in command of the militia group known as New Spartans. Intelligence revealed Haley was to make an exchange of money for a quantity of automatic weapons to conduct domestic terrorist activities and to further their express goal of overthrowing the federal government. Due to reasons that are still under review, our operation failed. Jacob Steven Haley remains at large. Whereabouts unknown.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: What about the weapons?

speaker: SKINNER
line: An arms dealer name Cadre who died at the scene received from Haley a $50,000 bearer bond. Presumably, this was payment for weapons delivered.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: In other words, Haley not only got away, he got away with $50,000 worth of guns? Have we determined a cause of death? How Haley killed this man?

speaker: SCULLY
line: He was killed by means of a highly toxic biological agent.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: What kind of toxin are we talking about?

speaker: SCULLY
line: We don’t know. It’s affect on the dermis and the soft tissues, the rapidity of it’s action – it is not a disease known in nature. It would seem to be genetically engineered. A bioweapon.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: How the hell did he get it?

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: The former Soviet Union. Security on the Siberian Vector Lab is, uh, lax. It’s conceivable it was stolen, though we have no confirmation from Moscow.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: So this is out in the ozone now? Is this stuff floating through Folger Park?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Level Four decontamination procedures were undertaken immediately. Our best indications are that exposure was limited and that the toxin was transmitted directly and not contagious.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: How do you know that?

speaker: MULDER
line: We’re not all dead?

speaker: SCULLY
line: At this point, we can only guess that the toxin was transmitted by liquid or gas, touch or injection.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Anybody care to tell me how this guy, Haley eluded us?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Video recon indicates Haley had an accomplice at the park. We have yet to identify who this was, or how Haley knew he was under surveillance.

speaker: FBI AGENT
line: He must have made us.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Could he have?

speaker: SKINNER
line: No. Every member was chosen for their lack of exposure in terrorist circles.

speaker: MULDER
line: Haley’s extremely suspicious to the point of paranoia. He’s got military training and a guerrilla mentality.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Second only to this man. August Bremer. He’s the group's mastermind. However, there are reports that he and Haley are vying for control. This destabilization makes August Bremer our primary threat.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Well, this is it. This is the scenario we’ve all been worried about, people. Now, I need maximum control of information. Nothing leaves this room. The media gets a sniff, we’re going to disavow. We are going to stop these men. We’re going to make it all go away.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder.

speaker: USHERETTE
line: The show’s almost over.

speaker: BREMER
line: One, please.

speaker: BREMER
line: Thanks.

speaker: BREMER
line: I’d like some popcorn, please.

speaker: USHERETTE
line: Do you want large, extra large or Jumbo large?

speaker: BREMER
line: Could I get some fresh popcorn, please. The sign says "Fresh Popcorn."

speaker: USHERETTE
line: This is fresh popcorn.

speaker: BREMER
line: No, fresh-fresh --- hot – out of the machine back there. Please. A large.

speaker: USHERETTE
line: I’ll have to make it. Probably take a minute.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah?

speaker: HALEY
line: You set me up.

speaker: MULDER
line: I saved your ass.

speaker: HALEY
line: Then why wasn’t I told?

speaker: MULDER
line: I didn’t know about the operation.

speaker: HALEY
line: It was your operation.

speaker: MULDER
line: No. The Justice Department got an anonymous tip. I found out a half hour before it went down. I did what I could.

speaker: HALEY
line: You’ll have to do better than that, Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: What else can I say? I-I got as much to lose here as you do. They catch you, you’ll flip me. Look, I believe in your ideals and your goals but the only reason I tolerate your methods is because the government’s are worse.

speaker: HALEY
line: Wow. What a ringing endorsement.

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey, you came to me, remember? I mean, what more do you want from me? I’ve risked everything. I’ve given you information. My partner is seriously suspicious. If that’s not enough for you, that’s all I’ve got.

speaker: TEEN 1
line: Ain’t nobody home.

speaker: TEEN 2
line: Eh, she’s in there. She’s just hiding or something.

speaker: TEEN 1
line: I’m thinking we could break for it right through the front doors.

speaker: TEEN 2
line: Why? I got us front row seats.

speaker: TEEN 1
line: She see us? Is she coming?

speaker: TEEN 2
line: Hey, man.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Maybe you can tell me what’s going on.

speaker: MANAGER
line: What?

speaker: SCULLY
line: There seems to be a problem. A man just told me you gave him keys to my room, room 130.

speaker: MANAGER
line: Who are you?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who am I? Who is he?

speaker: MANAGER
line: Mr. uh, Kaplan.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mr. Kaplan.

speaker: MANAGER
line: Yes.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Thank you.

speaker: MANAGER
line: Are you the wife?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Not even close.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah?

speaker: BREMER
line: We’ll proceed as planned.

speaker: DRIVER
line: Agent Mulder? You coming with us?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Shi….!

speaker: MAN
line: Step out of the car.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Exactly what agency are you from? Obviously not the Office of Information.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Agent Scully, take a seat.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What the hell is going on?

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: I apologize for our methods.

speaker: SKINNER
line: They may well have saved Agent Mulder’s life.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What about my life? I don’t appreciate being run off the road.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: We had our reasons.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You’re suspicious Agent Mulder’s betrayed his country.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don‘t know what you’re talking about.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Your discretion is understandable. In point of fact, Agent Mulder’s actions are entirely honorable. What you’ve stumbled into is a classified action, a deep-cover assignment.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Until now, Agent Mulder’s true mission was known only to the US Attorney and myself.

speaker: SCULLY
line: His true mission?

speaker: SKINNER
line: The council we sat in was front to make the New Spartans believe we were unaware of Agent Mulder’s complicity.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why him? Why choose Agent Mulder?

speaker: SKINNER
line: We didn’t choose him. They did.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: He spoke at a UFO conference in Boston where he broadcast his feelings about the government and their conspiracies against the American people. Somebody from the organization was listening so the man who escaped, Haley, sent out feelers in hopes that Agent Mulder was a man whose politics were in line with his own. Someone on the inside that he could use.

speaker: SCULLY
line: To what aim?

speaker: SKINNER
line: That we don’t know.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You’ve put Agent Mulder’s life in danger by not telling me.

speaker: SKINNER
line: I advised him not to tell you. He’s at a very delicate point. Everything he does now must work to build trust.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Including letting this man Haley get away with murder? Sir, we know nothing about this bioweapon. We don’t know what they want to use it for. We don’t even know if they have the capacity to store it safely. Putting Agent Mulder in this situation is extremely risky.

speaker: SKINNER
line: They want something from him. We have no other way of learning what.

speaker: AGENT
line: Movie theatre in Ohio. Whatever they’re using, they’ve used it again.

speaker: MULDER
line: Ooh. Is this the Pepsi challenge? How ’bout some, uh, fresh air, boys?

speaker: HALEY
line: Welcome, Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: Okay, deal me in.

speaker: HALEY
line: This is just a little method that we use to learn the truth.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, you might want to put that hood back on me unless you want to see a grown man cry.

speaker: HALEY
line: What happened in the park?

speaker: MULDER
line: I told you on the phone. FINGER BREAKING MAN twists and breaks MULDER’s finger. MULDER screams in pain.)

speaker: MULDER
line: I was set up. I’m telling the truth. Wait, wait! Wait! I let you go!

speaker: HALEY
line: You’re spying on us, aren’t you?

speaker: MULDER
line: No. No. No.

speaker: MULDER
line: You want me to lie and say yes?

speaker: MULDER
line: I’m going to kill you, you son of a bitch! I’m going to kill you! If I set you up you think I’d even get into the car with this Nazi piece of shi…!

speaker: MULDER
line: I risked everything! If I was lying, there’d be federal agents descending on this place like the wrath of God right now. If you touch me again, you’d better kill me!

speaker: HALEY
line: A war is going on, Agent Mulder. Either you’re on the right side or the wrong. You’ve seen the effects of this?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah.

speaker: HALEY
line: Would you like to see them again?

speaker: MULDER
line: No, I didn’t set you up. If you got set up, it was one of yours.

speaker: HALEY
line: You know what? I believe you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are you reading in there?

speaker: TECH
line: We’ve been through and through. No hot zones. No atmospheric. You’re clear, Agent Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Thank you.

speaker: SKINNER
line: 14 victims total, including patrons, a projectionist and an employee.

speaker: SKINNER
line: That’s the usherette. There were two survivors. Two teenage boys.

speaker: SKINNER
line: How did it happen that those two kids survived?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don’t know. But it’s going to help us establish a method of delivery. It’s doubtful the pathogen was airborne. They found no atmospheric traces. So it’s got to be something that everybody touched.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Don’t be alarmed.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, get out of here.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder …

speaker: MULDER
line: Get out of here!

speaker: SCULLY
line: I know what you’re doing. Skinner told me everything.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don’t know what you’re talking about

speaker: SCULLY
line: What happened to your hand?

speaker: MULDER
line: Nothing.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh, Mulder, what did they do to you? God, this needs to be set. You’re in pain.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah, if you keep pulling it around like that.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Let’s get the swelling down.

speaker: SCULLY
line: They’ve killed again, Mulder. 14 people in a movie theatre in Ohio. The same toxin they released in the park.

speaker: MULDER
line: 14 people? That doesn’t make any sense.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Unless it was a test… for something bigger.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why do this to you, Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: They’re testing me, too. Haley’s paranoid … and spooked. I was sure he was going to kill me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What stopped him?

speaker: MULDER
line: They still need something from me … and I’m sensing there’s someone Haley trusts even less – The man giving him his orders. Someone I haven’t met yet. A guy named August Bremer.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What happened to your hand?

speaker: MULDER
line: Terrorist lie detector.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Well, did you pass?

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, I must have. I’m still here. They told me what they want. Documentation from the federal reserve bank. Fund transfer schedules for the eastern seaboard. Cash money.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: They’re going to hit a bank or an armored car.

speaker: SKINNER
line: That’s it? That’s all?

speaker: MULDER
line: I think I convinced Haley that the near miss in Folger Park was due to a mole inside his own group. He wants surveillance files on them.

speaker: SKINNER
line: How soon?

speaker: MULDER
line: They’re waiting for my call.

speaker: SKINNER
line: All right, we’ll need some time to redact. Dummy something up.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: No, I anticipated this. I’ve got files ready to use.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You know, I’m getting a bad feeling about this. I want a tail on him.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: No tail.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Once they get what they want from Mulder, what’s to keep them from killing him?

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: They spot a tail on him, they’re gonna shoot him on the spot. We have got no other way of learning what they want past this – What the big picture is.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You may not have another chance to contact us.

speaker: MULDER
line: If you don’t hear from me by midnight … feed my fish.

speaker: TECH
line: That’s it. That’s your bug.

speaker: SCULLY
line: It’s a bacterium.

speaker: TECH
line: An especially virulent one. We isolated it from the bearer bond.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Was the bacterium also found on the ticket stub?

speaker: TECH
line: Actually, no. Barring the usual particles and dust mites the ticket stub was clean.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, then how was the biotoxin spread throughout the theatre?

speaker: TECH
line: I don’t know.

speaker: SCULLY
line: It looks like streptococcus.

speaker: TECH
line: A strain of streptococcus, but one that has been genetically altered to make it extraordinarily lethal.

speaker: SCULLY
line: But strep wouldn’t be able to survive any kind of exposure to the environment.

speaker: TECH
line: Normally. But whoever produced this has cleverly coded the bacterium with a synthetic protective covering. The covering gives them an adhesive quality. It’s like a scratch and sniff. Dermal contact activates the contagion. It’s ingenious in its own evil way.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Developed by the Russians?

speaker: TECH
line: I’ve seen everything in the Russian arsenal. They’ve got nothing this sophisticated.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, then by whom?

speaker: HALEY
line: Do you have what we need?

speaker: MULDER
line: Tell the gimp to back off.

speaker: HALEY
line: Give me the files.

speaker: MULDER
line: I need that back by tomorrow.

speaker: HALEY
line: Lies within lies. Put the hood on. You’re going with us.

speaker: MULDER
line: No.

speaker: HALEY
line: You put it on or the gimp puts it on for you.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Skinner.

speaker: SCULLY
line: The biotoxin was applied to the bearer bond with an aerosol spray, but there is no evidence whatsoever of it on the theatre stubs. Now, I still have no idea how these kids were unaffected.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Have you ID’d the toxin? Agent Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sir, are you alone?

speaker: SKINNER
line: No. Why?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I’d like to speak with you in private.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You’re off the speaker.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Thank you. Now, CIA Intelligence suggested that this biotoxin was stolen from the Russians, but my research indicates that it was almost certainly developed domestically.

speaker: SKINNER
line: The United States has no bioweapons, Agent Scully. President Nixon dismantled our program in 1969.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes, sir, that’s what we’ve been told, but the CDC database contains evidence of a streptococcus bacterium being developed by the Army’s Pine Bluff Facility in the 1960’s. It appears to be a very primitive strain of what we’re seeing here.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What are you saying?

speaker: SCULLY
line: What I’m saying is that the bioweapons program may have continued in secret and that someone may be sending Agent Mulder on a suicide mission.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Right. Thank you.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: What is it?

speaker: SKINNER
line: She’s just .. concerned for her partner.

speaker: BREMER
line: You put us all at risk bringing him here.

speaker: HALEY
line: We took the usual precautions. Anyway he came through for us. Federal Reserve schedules for tomorrow.

speaker: BREMER
line: You’re a believer?

speaker: MULDER
line: I have my beliefs.

speaker: BREMER
line: You willing to die for them?

speaker: MULDER
line: I’d prefer it didn’t come to that.

speaker: BREMER
line: We have a job to do.

speaker: BREMER
line: You’re Dracula.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh, damn. The money. Oh, my God, the money.

speaker: HALEY
line: Mulder, take it.

speaker: BREMER
line: Make sure you point that the right way.

speaker: MANAGER
line: Euna, can I have the keys, please?

speaker: BREMER
line: You do what I say, or I’ll shoot you!

speaker: HALEY
line: Three minutes!

speaker: BREMER
line: Open the gate. Open it!

speaker: TERRORIST 1
line: Get down! Now! Everybody down! Now!

speaker: TERRORIST 2
line: Don’t be foolish. Give us the money and we’ll be gone. Move back! Move it! Come on! Move it! Down! Move it! Down, here, now! Don’t touch that phone!

speaker: BREMER
line: Dracula, take the teller.

speaker: MULDER
line: Right.

speaker: HALEY
line: Step away from the counter! Open the doors! Put your hands up on the windows now! Now! Do it! Get down!

speaker: TERRORIST 2
line: You! Here! Get down! Now! Get down!

speaker: HALEY
line: Two minutes!

speaker: BREMER
line: Let’s open it! Open it!

speaker: FBM
line: Don’t move!

speaker: MULDER
line: I got it!

speaker: HALEY
line: Is he dead?

speaker: MULDER
line: No. He’s still alive.

speaker: HALEY
line: Finish him!

speaker: HALEY
line: One minute thirty!

speaker: HALEY
line: You! Face down on the floor! Right here!

speaker: HALEY
line: What are you waiting for? Do it!

speaker: TERRORIST 2
line: Get down!

speaker: HALEY
line: I told you to finish him. Finish him!

speaker: BREMER
line: That weapon’s traceable. Go.

speaker: BREMER
line: Get the hell out of here. Go! Go!

speaker: MULDER
line: What are you doing? What are you doing?

speaker: BREMER
line: The bills could be traced.

speaker: MULDER
line: The bank heist was a decoy. To contaminate the money you didn’t take.

speaker: BREMER
line: No more tests, Mr. Mulder. This is the real deal. You’ve been a big help.

speaker: HALEY
line: Put that down.

speaker: BREMER
line: He’s a liability now.

speaker: HALEY
line: To who? You? If you think you’re going to kill Mulder to protect your secret, it’s too late. I already know your secret. Agent Mulder provided us with FBI surveillance reports – files which contain the name of a source who’s been leaking information on us for a period of two years – Charles Bogard. See, Bogard is an alias an old one – for August Bremer.

speaker: BREMER
line: Agent Mulder knows my alias just as he knew a false report would feed your ambition and pit you against me.

speaker: HALEY
line: Mulder risked his life for us.

speaker: BREMER
line: Are you sure about that?

speaker: MULDER
line: They're testing me, too. Haley's paranoid... and spooked. I was sure he was going to kill me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What stopped him?

speaker: MULDER
line: They still need something from me. And I'm sensing there's someone Haley trusts even less.

speaker: HALEY
line: What the hell is this?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Director Skinner, you’ve got to get to Mulder. You’ve got to find the bank that they hit..

speaker: SKINNER
line: That’s what we’re trying to do.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Mulder’s life is in danger -- and anybody else who touches the currency at that location. They’re putting the biotoxin on the money.

speaker: SKINNER
line: We’ve got no way of contacting him – not without blowing his cover.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You’ve got no choice.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: We had surveillance tapes satellited to us -- There have been 27 robberies in seven eastern states, all this morning.

speaker: SKINNER
line: There’s been no sign of Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, he’s got to be on there somewhere.

speaker: BREMER
line: We’ve made some decisions.

speaker: BREMER
line: Take it and get out of here. I don’t want to see your face again. Go.

speaker: BREMER
line: On your feet.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don’t need a car. You can just call me a cab, that’d be fine.

speaker: BREMER
line: Let’s go.

speaker: MULDER
line: Go where?

speaker: BREMER
line: Witnessing the murder of a federal agent will make these men an accessory to the crime.

speaker: MULDER
line: You hear that?

speaker: FINGER BREAKING MAN
line: I wouldn’t miss it for the world.

speaker: BREMER
line: Stop there. Down on your knees. Hands behind your back.

speaker: BREMER
line: There’s a car for you just over the rise. Head south ‘till you get to the highway.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who are you?

speaker: BREMER
line: Go on. If they come out here and find us, they’ll kill us both. Go.

speaker: POLICE
line: Hey! Hold it ! Who are you?

speaker: MULDER
line: FBI. Who’s in charge? Who’s in charge? I need everybody out of the bank!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: The money! They sprayed the money.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We got here an hour ago before any of the funds were touched or transferred. The cash supply is being isolated. It’s being locked down in the vault.

speaker: MULDER
line: How did you know it was this bank?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I recognized you from the surveillance tape.

speaker: MULDER
line: With the …?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Your finger.

speaker: MULDER
line: August Bremer, or whatever his real name is – he’s working with us.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, before you go any further you should know that the biotoxin they used may have come from government labs. Our government.

speaker: MULDER
line: You’re saying I was set up?

speaker: SKINNER
line: We have no definitive information to justify that position.

speaker: MULDER
line: I was being used? This whole operation? The people who died in that theatre?

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Agent Mulder. Our government is not in the business of killing innocent civilians.

speaker: MULDER
line: The hell they aren’t. Those were tests on us to be used on someone else.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Those bills have been analyzed. The money in the vault gave no readings. There’s absolutely no evidence of any biotoxins. So, before you climb on any bandwagon …

speaker: SCULLY
line: You knew about this all along. You knew about this the whole time!

speaker: MULDER
line: I want that money rechecked.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: That money has been cleared. It’s being used as evidence in a federal crime.

speaker: MULDER
line: That money’s as dirty as you are, isn’t it. Isn’t it?

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Say that were true. Then what do you hope to accomplish , Agent Mulder, as a whistle-blower? To mobilize a civil rights action? To bring down the federal government? To do the very work that group you were a part of is so bent on doing? What do you want? Laws against those men, or laws protecting them?

speaker: MULDER
line: I want people to know the truth.

speaker: CIA AGENT
line: Well sometimes our job is to protect those people from knowing it. Excuse me.
